voice.text: If you need help with letters or parcels, just ask me. I can explain everything.
Don't forget to include a label in your parcel!

parameter.value: At your service |PLAYERNAME| and welcome to the post office.
Here. Don't forget that you need to buy a label too if you want to send a parcel. Always write the name of the {receiver} in the first line and the name of the {city} in the second line.
